main event: On July 25, 1967, a civilian reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object in Westmont, Illinois.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 seconds,The object was observed ascending rapidly at about a 40-degree angle,The reported object had a flattened ring-like top and an inverted saucer-like bottom,The witness and his friend were in a car approximately 1/4 mile away when observing the phenomenon,No physical evidence or photographs were obtained during the investigation.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object, described as oblong with a color effect
